sentences.sContent: We described how the golden plover manages to fly over thousands of miles of uncharted water each year directly and unerringly to Hawaii.
sentences.sContent_eng: We described how the golden plover manages to fly over thousands of miles of uncharted water each year directly and unerringly to Hawaii.
sentences.sCn: 我们叙述金睢鸠（或黄千鸟）如何于每年飞过数千哩毫无标帜的汪洋大海，直接而无误地飞抵夏威夷。

words.tran: 无过失的；不犯错误的；没有打歪的
